title: Bug 159143subtype pattern not working for declare annotation on method
description: Bug 159143subtype pattern not working for declare annotation on method
OB: Using AspectJ 1.5.3.200609271036, when declaring an annotation on a method, get unexpected error when using subtype wildcard for the declaring type.E.g.,declare @method : void Foo+.foo() : @MethodAnnotation;Error text: "The method 'void Foo+.foo()' does not exist"
SR: Using AspectJ 1.5.3.200609271036, when declaring an annotation on a method, get unexpected error when using subtype wildcard for the declaring type.E.g.,declare @method : void Foo+.foo() : @MethodAnnotation;Error text: "The method 'void Foo+.foo()' does not exist"
